title: Eats, Shoots & Leaves: Why, Commas Really Do Make a Difference!
description: Illuminating the comical confusion the lowly comma can cause, this new edition of Eats, Shoots & Leaves uses lively, subversive illustrations to show how misplacing or leaving out a comma can change the meaning of a sentence completely.This picture book is sure to elicit gales of laughter—and better punctuation—from all who read it.
author: Lynne Truss
